message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, as that's what I'm comfortable spending.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $15,000 is really the lowest I'm willing to go. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
